WorkItem.Description:
I want to use frozen panes in a number of sheets.
When I reset the active sheet to one sheet, only the before the active, the active sheet and the next sheet will have freeze panes if I use the Excel 5 writer. The Excel 2007 writer doesn't have this problem.

I have attached a demo script to illustrate this issue. Change the active sheet index at line 18, to see the effect of the moving freeze panes.
WorkItem.Summary: Problem with freezePane and Excel 5 writer
